title: Phase 2: Core Editor
description: Build the core SVG-based canvas editor with viewport controls, selection system, and basic drawing capabilities

title: Implement SVG viewport with pan/zoom
description: Create Viewport.svelte component with pan (middle-mouse/spacebar drag) and zoom (scroll wheel, zoom to cursor) functionality. Include fit-to-content button and zoom presets.

title: Create grid rendering
description: Implement Grid.svelte with configurable spacing (1', 6", 1m, etc.), snap-to-grid toggle, and visual grid lines that scale with zoom

title: Build selection system
description: Implement SelectionOverlay.svelte with click-to-select, shift+click multi-select, and marquee selection. Create selectionStore for managing selected objects.

title: Implement basic shape drawing
description: Create drawing tools for lines, rectangles, and circles in ToolOverlay.svelte. Include drag-to-create, move, rotate, duplicate, and delete operations.

title: Create instrument symbol library
description: Build InstrumentSymbol.svelte with SVG path definitions for all instrument types (ERS, PAR, Fresnel, Cyc, Moving lights, LED, etc.). Symbols should scale with zoom and show rotation clearly.

title: Build properties panel
description: Implement PropertiesPanel.svelte with context-sensitive property editing for instruments (channel, dimmer, color, etc.), hanging positions, and project settings when nothing selected.

title: Phase 1: Foundation
description: Set up the foundational infrastructure for LightsLite including SvelteKit project, database, authentication, and basic routing.

title: Initialize SvelteKit project with TypeScript
description: Set up a new SvelteKit 2.x project with TypeScript 5.x and Svelte 5.x

title: Set up Tailwind CSS
description: Configure Tailwind CSS 4.x for styling the application

title: Configure Vercel adapter
description: Set up @sveltejs/adapter-vercel for deployment to Vercel edge functions

title: Set up Neon database and Drizzle ORM
description: Configure Neon Postgres database connection with @neondatabase/serverless and set up Drizzle ORM with drizzle.config.ts

title: Create database schema and run migrations
description: Define Drizzle schema for users, projects, hanging_positions, instruments, set_pieces, annotations, and project_history tables. Run initial migrations.

title: Implement Neon Auth integration
description: Set up @neondatabase/auth for user authentication including sign-in, sign-up, session management, and protected routes

title: Create basic route structure
description: Set up route structure: landing page, auth pages, app shell, project list, editor page, and API routes for projects

title: Phase 6: Polish
description: Final polish including project management, crash recovery, offline support, performance optimization, and testing

title: Add project management (list, create, delete)
description: Implement project list page, NewProjectDialog.svelte, project deletion with confirmation, and recent projects. Add API routes for project CRUD operations.

title: Implement crash recovery
description: On app load, detect if previous session crashed and offer to restore from IndexedDB. Maintain last 50 states for recovery. Handle corrupted state gracefully.

title: Add offline indicator
description: Show network status in StatusBar.svelte. Handle offline mode gracefully with localStorage fallback. Queue sync operations when offline.

title: Performance optimization
description: Optimize SVG rendering for 200+ instruments. Implement spatial indexing (quadtree) for hit testing. Throttle auto-save and use requestAnimationFrame for smooth pan/zoom.

title: Testing and bug fixes
description: Write tests for critical functionality. Validate data on load. Test across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge. Fix bugs discovered during testing phase.

title: Phase 5: Paperwork
description: Implement report generation for production paperwork including channel hookup, instrument schedule, dimmer schedule, and export to PDF/CSV

title: Build channel hookup report
description: Create channel-hookup.ts generator and ChannelHookup.svelte component. Sort by channel number with columns: Channel, Dimmer, Position, Unit #, Type, Color, Gobo, Purpose, Notes.

title: Create instrument schedule
description: Create instrument-schedule.ts generator and InstrumentSchedule.svelte. Sort by hanging position then unit number with full instrument details.

title: Implement dimmer schedule
description: Create dimmer-schedule.ts generator and DimmerSchedule.svelte. Sort by dimmer number showing patched instruments with load information.

title: Add PDF export
description: Implement pdf.ts for generating formatted PDF paperwork. Create API route /api/projects/[id]/reports/[type] for server-side PDF generation.

title: Add CSV export
description: Implement csv.ts for exporting reports and channel/dimmer patch data. Support console import format for lighting console patching.

title: Phase 3: Data Layer
description: Implement the data synchronization layer including Svelte stores, IndexedDB persistence, server sync, and undo/redo functionality

title: Implement Svelte stores for project state
description: Create projectStore, selectionStore, viewportStore, toolStore, and historyStore. Include derived stores for instruments, positions, and layers.

title: Build IndexedDB persistence layer
description: Implement indexeddb.ts using 'idb' library for local caching. Auto-save on every meaningful change (debounced ~500ms), maintain last 50 states for crash recovery.

title: Create SyncManager for server sync
description: Implement manager.ts to orchestrate sync between stores, IndexedDB, and API. Handle debounced saves to server (500ms), version tracking, and dirty state indicator.

title: Implement undo/redo system
description: Create historyStore with command pattern for undo/redo. Support Ctrl+Z/Ctrl+Shift+Z shortcuts. Track state changes for instruments, positions, and other editable objects.

title: Add version conflict handling
description: Implement conflict.ts with server-authoritative conflict resolution. Handle version mismatches by presenting user with options to keep local, accept server, or merge changes.

title: Phase 4: Domain Features
description: Implement lighting design-specific features including hanging positions, instrument placement, venue configuration, layers, and keyboard shortcuts

title: Implement hanging position tools
description: Create tools for drawing electrics, trusses, ladders, booms, box-booms, and ground rows. Include PositionLine.svelte component and PositionsLayer.svelte.

title: Build instrument placement with snapping
description: Implement instrument placement tool with snap-to-position, snap-to-grid, and snap-to-centerline/plasterline. Auto-assign unit numbers on positions.

title: Create venue/stage configuration
description: Implement StageLayer.svelte with venue bounds, proscenium settings, centerline/plasterline display, walls, and grid configuration. Add scale settings (feet/meters).

title: Add layer system
description: Implement layer management with Background, Set/Scenic, Hanging Positions, Instruments, Annotations, and user-defined layers. Support lock, hide, and dim operations.

title: Implement keyboard shortcuts
description: Create keyboard.ts with shortcuts for tools (V, H, I, E), editing (Ctrl+Z, Ctrl+Shift+Z, Ctrl+D, Ctrl+A, Delete), view (Ctrl+0, +, -), and file (Ctrl+S, Ctrl+Shift+E).
